Title: Lucy
Overview: A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.
Tagline: The average person uses 10% of their brain capacity. Imagine what she could do with 100%.
Keywords: artificial intelligence, telepathy, intelligence, drug mule, telekinesis, futuristic, drug, superpower, tough girl, imax, surgery, brain capacity, synthetic drug, human brain
production_companies: Universal Pictures, TF1 Films Production, Canal+, EuropaCorp, Ciné+
Cast: Scarlett Johansson, Morgan Freeman, Choi Min-sik
